scenes.description: Wait time screen featuring event key visuals, attendance rules, penlight colors, and fan messages.
Product introduction segment from Bandai and Bandai Spirits.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will start in a moment.

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上 照明の点滅にご注意ください / 声出し応援 OK です
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance / Cheering loudly is OK.

subtitles.original: バンダイ、バンダイスピリッツより、
hololive EXPO 2025の会場にある特設ブースで、
subtitles.english: at the special booth at the hololive EXPO 2025 venue,

subtitles.original: 展示中の商品をご紹介！
subtitles.english: we introduce products currently on display!
